Package com.flipfit.bean

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.bean.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
The Customer class represents a customer user in the FlipFit system. It contains details specific to a customer, such as their user ID and payment information. This class is linked to the User class through the userId.
Author:

      Constructs a new Customer object for a newly registered customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user.
      paymentType - The type of payment method.
      paymentInfo - The details of the payment method.
      balance - The wallet balance of customer.
